subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: U.C.L.A.’s Josh Shipp, a junior guard/forward, declared his intention to enter the N.B.A. draft. He will not hire an agent, leaving him the option of returning to the Bruins. Shipp is the fourth U.C.L.A. starter to enter the June draft, with the freshman Kevin Love, the sophomore Russell Westbrook and the junior Luc Richard Mbah a Moute.
